revision.text: Possibly: Observations on a tour through the Highlands and part of the Western Isles of Scotland, particularly Staffa and Icolmkill: to which are added, a description of the falls of the Clyde, of the country round Moffat, and an analysis of its mineral waters. In two volumes. By T. Garnett, M.D. Member of the Royal Medical, Physical, and Natural History Societies of Edinburgh... (Thomas Garnett). 2v. (London : Printed by Luke Hansard, Great Turnstile, Lincoln's-Inn Fields, for T. Cadell, Junior, & W. Davies, in the Strand, 1800). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2047837~S1
